personal_info.summary: Senior Software Developer with over 10+ years of experience focused on PHP developments, CMS (WordPress), and Frameworks like Laravel and Codeigniter. I have experience with RESTful APIs for iOS and Android applications, and I have developed userfacing dashboards where I apply my skills in CSS and JavaScript. I have created, maintained, improved, redesigned, and restructured WordPress blocks for better performance. Additionally, I have mentored junior developers and assisted in code reviews.

responsibilities: Automating payroll and human resources management systems, streamlining processes, and significantly reducing processing time.
Development of landing pages for small and medium-sized businesses, ensuring responsive web design and functional contact forms.
Create an online catalog system that allows users to upload PDFs with images, restaurant menus, and other content.
WordPress CMS maintenance, including plugin updates, theme modifications, and integration with payment gateways.
Develop and maintain WordPress blocks with best standards code and improve performance as a consequence.
Redesign and restructure themes and templates to launch new products.
Help coworkers with code reviews, managing tag releases and merging branches on Github.
Monitor GCP to ensure project consistency.
Create a connection between two platforms and a custom admin system for Project Managers.
Develop Restful API to centralize data and be consumed by Android/IOS Apps.
Implement e-commerce webpages with WordPress and WooCommerce, integrating CRM Software.
